appList.title: Family Feud® 2
appList.description:
*** Tabby Awards Winner: Users' Choice 2015 *** ***It’s time to play Family Feud 2 with your friends!***
Survey Says: Play the Sequel to the Ultimate Social Gaming experience on the go!

------------------------------------------

The all new Family Feud & Friends 2 is finally here! Enjoy stunning new graphics, all new surveys and twists allowing you to boost your scores! Find out who is the best Family Feud player by challenging your friends, family and the larger Family Feud & Friends community in head-to-head competition. Can you become the Ultimate Feuder? 

Family Feud 2 features:

• The ability to directly challenge friends and family or anyone from the larger Family Feud & Friends Community
• Discover the all new Tournament mode! Play live against 7 players, become the Tournament champion and win tons of coins!
• New, stunning graphics highlighting your favorite elements of the TV show: Family Feud has never looked so good!
• Complete new set of surveys
• New power-ups to boost your chances of scoring more points!
• Enhanced predictive text input and auto spell checker to make typing answers faster than ever!

Are you up for the challenge? Try it Now for Free!

By installing this application you agree to the terms of the licensed agreements.
appList.short_desc: Survey Says: Play the Sequel to the Ultimate Social Gaming experience on the go!
appList.what_is_new:
This Summer, Family Feud 2 celebrates 4th of July with our new Independence Tournament.
Collect 4 new trophies, including Lady Liberty herself, 4 new medals and hundreds of fun, patriotic surveys! Ring in summer with fireworks, food, fun and Feud!
We have set up a few new kinds of community promotions! Be sure to like our Facebook Page for updates!

appList.title: 100 PICS Quiz
appList.description:
The Worlds BIGGEST and BEST free picture quiz game - Over 10,000 picture puzzles to guess
- Over 100 quiz game categories to play
- Brand new puzzle packs added every week
- The free word game fun never ends!


DOWNLOAD NOW - BEST GAME EVER

- Just guess the picture to win coins
- Starts easy ... gets hard! 
- Win coins for correct pictures guessed 
- Use less clues = win more coins! 


NEW FUN QUIZ GAMES ADDED EVERY WEEK 


***** "More please it's so addictive" Jellybaby99 
***** "My whole family love playing this game!" Walisimo 1 
***** "So addictive, with lots of categories to choose :) " Manic Mum 69 


PERFECT FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY
• Perfect free word game for kids, adults, boys, girls, toddlers, mums, dads, grannies and granddads
• Help your kids learn spellings of common words in easy packs like A is for
• Kid friendly and funny word puzzle games like Guess the animals, games, sweets, fairy tales, pets, guess the emoji
• Seasonal funny packs like Halloween quiz game, and Christmas quiz game. Plus guess the toys, and guess the gadgets quiz games.


BEST FREE QUIZ GAME FOR LOGOS
• Love a logos quiz? 100 Pics has tons of logo quiz games; and one free logos quiz game included
• Many other logo games; guess the food logo quiz, guess the holiday logo quiz game, guess the band logo quiz, guess the candy logo, guess the tv show logo quiz, guess the movie logos quiz, guess the movie logo 2, guess the slogans quiz game


BEST FREE QUIZ GAME FOR EMOJI
• Do you love emoji games? We have 100’s!
• Guess the emoji quiz 1, guess the emoji quiz 2, guess the emoji quiz 3, guess the movie emoji
• Seasonal emoji; Guess the Halloween Emoji quiz, Guess the Christmas Emoji quiz, Star santa quiz game


ULTIMATE FREE QUIZ GAME FOR TV, MOVIES & CELEBS
• If you are a star spotter you will love 100 Pics Quiz
• The game includes a free guess the movies quiz game (movie stars)
• Also available are many more guess the movie, tv & celeb games; guess the actress quiz game, guess the actor quiz game, guess the tv star quiz game, guess the movie logo 1, guess the movie logo 2, guess the game show logo (US), guess the French logos quiz (FR), guess the movie villains, guess the movie quotes quiz game, guess the movie sets quiz game, guess the Oscars quizlet game, guess the celeb facebook profile pics quiz game, guess the soap stars quiz (UK), guess the movie quotes quiz game


TOP FREE QUIZ GAME FOR GENERAL KNOWLEDGE TESTS
• If you’re a quiz word game pro, you’ll find 100 PICS a real challenge
• Guess the history quiz has 100 pics from 100 years of history
• Science fan? How about these free word games; guess the science quiz games, guess the xmas quiz game, guess the news quiz games


TOP FREE QUIZ GAME FOR SONGS & MUSIC
• Love music? You’ll find many musical quizzes here
• Guess the music star word game, guess the band logo game, guess the instrument, guess the album cover, guess the song, guess the song


TOP FREE GAME FOR FOOTBALL
• Back of the net for Football fans! We have 100s of quizlet games for you
• Many other football quiz games; guess the player (legends), guess the football club logos quiz game, guess the footy phrase


TOP FREE GAME FOR NOSTALGIA 
• If you love looking back then look no further
• Lots of quizzes for the throwbacks; guess the 80s, guess the 90s, guess the character, guess the shadow quiz, guess the nostalgic toys, Halloween game, & Christmas game


NEW FROM 100 PICS Quiz & Poptacular
• 100 PICS Quiz is our global hit picture quiz game
• Word Search Pics is our hit word search puzzles game
• The ultimate free word game for kids and adults!
• Game packs on; guess the brand, tv stars, guess cartoon characters, guess the icon, guess the flag quiz, hidden object, guess the color, xmas gadgets, toys, 2013, 2014, thanksgiving, 80s, 90s, & word games mania
• 100s more fun free game packs
• We will remove any cheats or answers sites or apps
• POP Apps 2015

appList.title: Trivia Crack
appList.description:
Have fun challenging your friends and enemies in the hottest trivia game! Let our friendly spinner wheel, Willy, select which questions you’ll answer from six different categories. Be the first to get the six crowns to win, but watch out for the rematch!

Reasons you should be playing Trivia Crack right this second: 
- Hundreds of thousands of exciting questions
- You can create your own questions in the Factory
- Over 20 game languages
- Chat with your opponents
- Collectable card collection

Need more? No problem: 
- Prove how smart you are
- Learn something new while having fun
- Make your mother proud

So what are you waiting for? Let’s go! Download the game!

Warning: this game may cause an excess of fun. Please consult a professional if you notice your knowledge growing at an unusual rate.

Visit www.triviacrack.com for more information.

Questions? Concerns? Find the solution to all your problems here: support.etermax.com.

Be a social being, follow us!: 
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/triviacrack
- Twitter: @triviacrack
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/triviacrack
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/TriviaCrackOfficial
- Google+: https://plus.google.com/+TriviaCrackOfficial/
appList.short_desc: Test your knowledge and challenge your friends now! It’s Free!

appList.title: Food Quiz
appList.description:
Food Quiz is the ultimate food quiz game on Android! With over 3000 items and growing, Food Quiz has the largest collection of worldwide food items; this will allow you to discover foods from various regions. Challenge your friends to see who can solve the most foods. Your game progress will be synced with Facebook, so you can open the game on your PC.

Features:
- More than 3000 food items.
- Over 100 packs of food items organized into several regions.
- Available in 6 languages.
- Facebook Connect: enables you to compete with your friends and ask them for help!
- Scoreboard where you can compare your ranking with friends.
- Game progress is synced with Facebook. So you can play from either your phone or PC.
- Hints are awarded to help you figure out the answer!
- High quality graphics.
- Timely updates: new packs are added frequently.
appList.short_desc: Play the ultimate food quiz game and discover foods from all over the world.
appList.what_is_new:
Version 2.6.0
- Added tablet support
- Improved localization support
- Fixed bugs and improved performance
Version 2.5:
- Added new packs and items
- Added ability to Login via Google Play and Achievements
- Faster download
Version 2.4.4
Hints Special:
- You now get 2 Hints for each correct answer instead of 1!
- Increased Daily Hints reward from 10 Hints to 15 Hints.
Version 2.4.2
- Fixed crash in Honeycomb.

appList.title: Quiz: Logo game
appList.description:
Do you like logo quiz, trivia games? Do you think you know companies from all over the world? Quiz: Logo game is just for you! Find out just how much do you know! * guess 2175 brands from all over the world
* all American brands. Also Canadian and many more
* special American levels
* complete 69 engaging unique levels
* with increasing difficulty as you play along
* collect 44 achievements in Google Play Games
* compete with your friends and players from all over the world on two unique leaderboards
* use 6 cool unique hints to complete levels
* keep a track of your stats and progress
* complete picture appears when you guess the logo
* and all of that absolutely free

Updates with more levels and hundreds of brands coming soon.

In this trivia game you may find every brand category you love including cars, fashion, movies and games. In this logo quiz you can guess companies from all over the world as well as all American companies. Can you guess every brand you hold dear?

In our logo game you will find many more brands and hints not available in other games. All free.

All logos shown or represented in this game are copyright and/or trademark of their respective corporations. The use of low resolution images in this trivia app for use of identification in a informational context qualify as fair use under copyright law.
appList.short_desc: Over 500 American brands! Special American levels! 2175 brands worldwide!
appList.what_is_new:
3.1 & 3.1.1
* free hints
3.0
* new American level
* 75 new logos

appList.title: Smarter Than a 5th Grader?
appList.description:
Find out if you're SMARTER THAN A 5th GRADER with the all-new trivia game inspired by the hit TV show! School your classmates in some lightning-fast one-on-one competition and ace your way to the 5th Grade Final Exam. Will you make the grade or will you drop out of school? In this all new edition of Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader? you can:
✔ Put your knowledge to the test from Animal Science to World History!
✔ Challenge your friends and see who's top of the class!
✔ Take the ultimate 5th Grade Final Exam!
✔ Tackle over 15,000 original classroom questions!
✔ Use cheats to help answer hard subjects!
✔ Earn special achievements!

Class is back in session. Play Now!

By installing this application you agree to the terms of the licensed agreements.
appList.short_desc:
Class is back in session! 
Think You're Smarter Than A 5th Grader? Find out now!

appList.title: Close Up Character - Pic Quiz!
appList.description:
Can you guess the character name from the zoomed in picture? 
Close Up Character is a free pop quiz game where you guess the names of hidden characters from popular cartoons, movies, games and more!! Reasons you should be playing Close Up Character right this second:
★ NO ADVERTISEMENTS WHEN PLAYING!
Close Up Character keeps the ads to a minimum. You'll never be interrupted by ads when guessing!
★ THE MOST ADDICTIVE BRAINTEASER IN THE WORLD!
There are over 5,000,000 Close Up Character users playing across the globe. Join them!
★ FREE COINS TO PLAY
You can earn free coins and hints easily by using lottery machine. Never stuck with hard levels again!
★ LOTS OF PIC CATEGORIES TO TEST YOUR KNOWLEDGE
- Cartoon characters.
- Famous actors and actresses chosen from action, horror or comedy movies.
- Superheroes and villains from comic book.
- Anime and Manga characters.
- Popular game characters.
★ SIMPLE BUT SUPER FUN GAMEPLAY
The question rule is very simple: Guess the hidden character name from close up picture to win!
★ TONS OF AWESOME QUESTIONS TO BEAT
Hundreds of questions to tease your brain and train your movie knowledge: learn something new while having fun. Try to guess them all!

REVIEWS

"I love guessing Close Up Character! This zoomed in pop quiz game is awesome and so fun!" - 5/5
"Awesome game! It's a brilliant picture puzzle pop quiz game and if you're a big movie fan, this one is definitely for you! " - 5/5
"It's a fun quiz game and very addicting, I can guess the zoomed in character for hours!" - 5/5
"A simple but super fun pop quiz game: we guess the hidden character name from popular cartoons or movies! Love it!" - 5/5
"A nice free guessing puzzle game! I find lots of my favorite comic book hero and anime characters here!" - 5/5
"Real pop quiz to test your movie knowledge!" - 5/5
"I ask for a simple but fun game to relax, and it I found this free puzzle word game!" - 5/5

Connect with us to get newest game updates and join events for coupon codes!
Follow us: http://twitter.com/goda_game
Like us: https://www.facebook.com/godagame


WANT TO TEST YOUR KNOWLEDGE? WANT TO PROVE YOU ARE A BIG MOVIE FAN?
GET CLOSE UP CHARACTER AND PLAY FOR FREE NOW!
appList.short_desc: Guess the character name from zoomed in photo from cartoon,movie, game or anime!
appList.what_is_new:

★ 40 NEW LEVELS UPDATED!
★ GET FREE COUPON CODES FOR COINS!
And thank you all for supporting Close Up Character! If you like the game, please give the game a 5 stars rate :).

appList.title: Guess The Song - Music Quiz
appList.description:
Just take the challenge and guess the song! 
Who doesn’t love music? Enjoy listening to thousands of songs and compete with your friends to become a Music Master. Play, listen to music, have fun and be the best with Guess The Song - Music Quiz! Do you like guessing trivia games? This song quiz is perfect choice for you.
The game is full of various songs in many categories. Choose the list of songs you like most, play, keep guessing songs and have a lot of fun. 

How many songs can you name correctly? How many artist can you recognize? How fast you are? Play in 2 players mode and compare your score with friends. 

Discover new songs and music genre! Everyone will find something interesting in many category lists: 
- The Latest Hits,
- 2000's Pop Hits,
- 2000's Rock List,
- 60s, 70s, 80s and 90s Hits,
- Overtime Rock Hits,
- Love Songs,
- Summer Hits,
- Hard Rock List,
- Rap, R&B, Hip - Hop,
- Country Hits,
- One Hit Wonders,
- Female Singers List,
- Movie Themes!

Available also on the App Store http://bit.ly/GuessTheSongMusicQuiz

The greatest hits only! Spend some time with music you love not only listening to it but playing the quiz and having a lot of fun in the same time! Download Guess The Song for free and enjoy this music app.
appList.short_desc: Thousands of hits to guess ♥ Plenty of music genre ♥ Join 20 MM amused players

appList.title: True or False: Quiz Battle
appList.description:
Get ready for the definitive quiz game! Take on exciting knowledge duels and get your fix of trivia fun! Play 1000’s of astounding questions in 15 categories! The best of both worlds - True or False meets Multiple Choice! 4 rounds of great Multiple Choice questions are followed by a bonus round of crazy True or False facts where it’s all to play for!


TRUE OR FALSE?


YOU CAN CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS! True!!!
…or play against random opponents. Can you outsmart them to climb the ranks?!


YOU CAN PLAY 1000’S OF ASTOUNDING QUESTIONS! True!!!
You’ll be amazed at awesome questions and crazy facts!


YOU GET THE BEST OF BOTH WORLDS! True!!!
Choose from 15 categories in the Multiple Choice rounds – play to your strengths or catch out your opponent.
But watch out! In the True or False round, tricky false statements are mixed in with real facts!


YOU CAN CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE CATEGORIES! True!!!

- Body & Soul
- Books & Words
- Flora & Fauna
- Food & Drink
- Film
- Games
- Geo
- History
- Life & Style
- Music
- Science
- Sport
- Tech
- TV
- Web


YOU CAN WIN A REAL-LIFE UNICORN! False!!! (Sorry, we couldn’t help ourselves)


OTHER FEATURES

- In-game chat function
- Intuitive gameplay, no complicated rules
- Great graphics & stunning sounds
- A whole load of FUN!!!! :D


DOWNLOAD & JOIN THE QUIZ FUN NOW!
appList.short_desc: Get your fix of trivia fun with the definitive quiz game!
appList.what_is_new:
Thank you so much for your support in making TRUE OR FALSE a success! Your feedback and reviews help us to make the game even better and bring you great new games too!
What's new?
- We've squashed some pesky crash bugs.

appList.title: QuizUp
appList.description:
QuizUp is a free, award-winning multiplayer trivia game. Challenge friends and meet new people who share your interests. Join a community of millions already playing the biggest trivia game in the world! ◆ The Game
Challenge friends in any topic for a quick, real-time match or randomly play other people from around the world. Climb the ranks and claim your titles.

◆ Topic Communities
Participate in vibrant communities around topics you are passionate about and easily discover new topics that match your interests. Each topic has a unique community where you can play, post and interact with other people.

Enjoy QuizUp on the web: http://www.quizup.com
And don’t forget to follow us:
Twitter: @QuizUp
appList.short_desc: The biggest trivia game in the world!
appList.what_is_new: Turns out it was all just a case of human error, lol. Eradicated all the humans, so QuizUp should be pretty much up to date now. 100101100
